C

checkFigure(List<Integer>) - Method in class model.DicePoker
Method that count player numbers of specific dice polls he got from a throw
ConsoleMessage(String...) - Method in class zOLDview.View
Method allows you to display message in console, and since it has changeable numbers of parameters you can display more than one message.

D

DicePoker - Class in model
Base business logic model class that should represents player results

Main controller/view class responsible for controlling data flow between model and display

DicePokerIllegalDataException - Exception in model
Exception class, throw DicePokerIllegalDataException is specific cases
DicePokerIllegalDataException(String) - Constructor for exception model.DicePokerIllegalDataException
Constructor that run construction of RuntimeException with defined message
displayMessage(String) - Method in class zOLDview.View
Deprecated.
Simple method that display give message, replaced with ConsoleMessage which can take more arguments

M

static void function allows to run application, with or without dice polls parameters provided as arguments
